Key:
(I took quite a bit of time shopping. I better
hurry home. I wonder if Maria made it home
safely.)

Huh...? That's... Maria, I think. She should've
made it home by now.
Heeey, Maria.
Wha? Where'd she go? What was that?

That... was Maria, I think.
I may have made a mistake.
It's bothering me. I'll go after her.
*pant, pant, pant*...

Damn it. I should've left my shopping bags
behind.
This is... Takadai Park.

(Takadai Park. There stood the figure of an
artificial Spirit looking up at the sky, gazing
beyond.)

(Strangely enough, it was a familiar sight to
me. Maria... looking up at the starry sky.
That figure.)
Maria...

Ahh. So you came here after all. As expected,
Shido Itsuka.
? Are you... Maria?
If that is what you think, then so be it.
No. You're very similar, but different.
Hmmm, I wonder why that is?
She's not one to look so testy.

I see. So you believe in Maria Arusu. The
one who has changed.
Changed? What are you talking about?

Just something to do with me. For you, it
might be a small thing, but it is very big to
me.
Like I asked, who exactly are you?

Arusu. I am Arusu. Okay then, farewell.
See you later, Shido Itsuka.
Whoa! So bright!

That light just now―
Wait, Maria?
She's gone. What was that...?

That wasn't Maria, was it? No...
Then who was it?

(For me, right now, there's so much I don't
know.)

(I saw Maria, clad in black, on my way home.
It was a mysterious encounter.)
I'm home.
Maria? Were you home this whole time?
Yes. What is the matter?

Um, just a moment ago, at Takadai Park...
You weren't there, were you?
I came straight here.
You didn't leave at all, right?

Yes. Shido, the intentions behind your line
of questioning are unclear.
No. Sorry, it's nothing.

(So that really wasn't Maria just now?
Even if I pressed further, she doesn't seem
to know.)

Shido! You were quite late. Where were you?
I am famished!

Ah, sorry, sorry. I'll get dinner ready now, so
wait just a second.
Hm! All right!
Shido, you appear to be deep in thought.

No, it's nothing. I think I was just mistaken
about something, so don't worry.
I understand.

Over there, huh? Did she mean the navigator
position?

(There's Maria here, and the Maria that I just
met. Maybe she has multiple personalities...?
It's a possibility.)
Hmm...

(As I figured, thinking won't give me any
answers. There's too much I don't know.)
Well, for now, it can wait until later.
